channel.title: JavaScript on Renderer
channel.description: Recent content in JavaScript on Renderer

item.title: JavaScript V8 Engine
item.description: V8 is Google’s open source high-performance JavaScript and WebAssembly engine, written in C++. It is used in Chrome and in Node.js, among others. It implements ECMAScript and WebAssembly, and runs on Windows 7 or later, macOS 10.

item.title: Deep Copy in JavaScript
item.description: Some methods to deep copy an object in JavaScript

item.title: Web Workers
item.description: Web Workers 是 JavaScript 的多執行緒解決方案
